subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion, Paul Casey, and the six-time winner Ernie Els advanced to the second round of the World Match Play Championship at Wentworth in Virginia Water, England. The top-seeded Casey beat Jerry Kelly, 3 and 2,. Els beat Colin Montgomerie, 6 and 5. Ángel Cabrera, the United States Open champion, beat Retief Goosen, 6 and 5.
